definition: coming right into one's face/imminent/to put first
at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: And if you trample something underfoot because it is childish it is likely to wither and die.
sentences.chinese: 因为幼稚，当头加以戕贼，也可以萎死的。

sentences.english: Indeed, many voters feel as though they've been "kicked in the head.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，很多选民感觉他们就像遭了当头一棒一样。

sentences.english: Suddenly there comes a terrible thunderclap overhead.
sentences.chinese: 突然间，一阵可怕的霹雳当头响了起来。

sentences.english: At the moment of the national crisis, Lin Shu was willing to be a "crowing cock at dawn".
sentences.chinese: 在国难当头的危机时刻，林纾甘做“叫旦之鸡”。

sentences.english: He gave these scoundrels a jolt .
sentences.chinese: 他给这些恶棍以当头一棒。

sentences.english: Over the past six months, I have made many speeches focusing on the importance of daring.
sentences.chinese: 这半年来，我讲了多次话，中心是讲敢字当头。

sentences.english: At noon the sun beated down on our heads as we walked home.
sentences.chinese: 我们中午回家时正是烈日当头。

sentences.english: The threat of war has united the country behind (ie in support of) its leaders.
sentences.chinese: 国难当头全国人民都团结在领袖的周围。

sentences.english: You start out in the baking sun, wearing little more than a tank top25) and shorts.
sentences.chinese: 出发时还是烈日当头，只穿着背心短裤就行。

sentences.english: As the moonlight brightens the empty mountain, my mind is freed.
sentences.chinese: 明月当头照空山，心已释然万里朗。

sentences.english: Suddenly there comes a terrible thunderclap overhead.
sentences.chinese: 突然间一阵可怖的霹雳当头响了起来。

sentences.english: They drive away the ass of the fatherless, they take the widow's ox for a pledge.
sentences.chinese: 他们拉去孤儿的驴，强取寡妇的牛为当头。

sentences.english: If the man is poor, do not go to sleep with his pledge in your possession.
sentences.chinese: 他若是穷人，你不可留他的当头过夜。

sentences.english: In fact, they hit it right on the head.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，它们给人当头棒喝。

sentences.english: Everything is not a cup in hand, life several months pledge?
sentences.chinese: 万事不如杯在手，人生几回月当头？

sentences.english: " Lucky Strike " is a blue-blooded Mongorian.
sentences.chinese: “鸿运当头”是一匹纯种的蒙古马。

definition: lit. to drop from the sky (idiom)/fig. to appear unexpectedly/to arise abruptly/out of the blue/to drop into one's lap
lit. splitting the head and covering the face (idiom); fig. pelting (with rain etc)/showering down
to hack/to chop/to split open/(of lightning) to strike
(idiom) no sooner said than done/before you know it
pinyin: shuo1 shi2 chi2 , na4 shi2 kuai4

definition: to swing (one's arms, a heavy object)/to wave (a sword, one's fists)/to fling (money)
lit. sth hits one in the face/directly in one's face/sth assaults the senses/blatant (advertising)/eye-catching/(a smell) assaults the nostrils
to charge/to pounce on/to swoop down on
